name: Metal Gear Solid: The Quest For Cardboard
name_original: Metal Gear Solid: The Quest For Cardboard
description:
Throughout the history of the Metal Gear games, Snake has always been sneaking around in cardboard boxes. And sometimes, he just can't get enough. Help Snake get more boxes!

Use the buttons on-screen to move Snake around or use the W, A, S, and D keys on the keyboard.
